page.title: 01Landscape in our area
page.content: { Our area is mostly{arable farmland, growing cereals, oil seed rape, sugar beet and potatoes. The land is very {flat}and drained by dykes and a man_ made channel, The Maxey Cut. There are two major villages,{Maxey (pop.650) and{Northborough}(pop.1200), and one hamlet,{Etton}(pop.90). Peterborough is the nearest large town, about 8 miles south of our area. The A15 goes through our area cutting between Northborough and Maxey. Both Nothborough and Maxey have a general shop with a post office but only Northborough has a primary school. Children from Maxey travel to Northborough by school bus each day, while the older children from each village are bussed to the local comprehensive school at Glinton. This is just to the south of our area.
